fields.description:
{html}

[INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/17/11 08:08 5d1f301) 3gt ipod touch 4.0.2

1.Mashups > YQL >YQL + Flickr
2.check console output
3.Nav back a few levels and note the activity indicator

results, endless spinner and console says:

Mon Jan 17 15:20:23 Apple- UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.pushtest[0xb66b][1945] : [WARN] Exception in event callback. {

fields.summary: iOS: iOS - YQL + Flickr fails to load with exception, spinner won't dismiss
